website_summaries.verdict: The Stability Fly from Propet has proved itself as a comfortable walking shoe that can accommodate special foot needs. As the name suggests, it is designed with stability in mind, making sure the foot stays supported throughout the walk. Its cozy knit upper also contributes to the experience with a snug and breathable coverage.
pros: Wearers agree across the board that the Stability Fly feels rather comfortable
People with bunions, hammer toes, arthritis, and plantar fasciitis highly appreciate this shoe for accommodating their foot conditions
The trainer can be comfortably used with custom orthotics, according to multiple buyers
Its mesh upper keeps the interiors ventilated, as stated by several customers
People with wide feet appreciate this model’s roomy fit and the availability of several width options
cons: A few disappointed purchasers wish the shoe had better underfoot support
One user reports that the fabric lace loop snapped after just a few times of wear

customer_reviews.title: Questionable Quality for such a high price.
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for about 2-3 months now and they have begun to have major issues. The bottom of the shoes are starting to come off from the rest of the shoe. It looks like the bottom was just glued on and is wearing off now. I had to use crazy glue to keep it together on both shoes. The tongue of the shoe folds very easily and makes wearing the shoe very uncomfortable upon insertion. And trying to fix it is a pain. I just gotta hope it doesnt fold every time I put on the shoe. Simply put, I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Wide shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I am an 8.5 6-8E (US mens shoe size), which is an extremely wide size. These, at 8.5 5E are among very few shoes that are almost wide enough for me without being crazy long. They also breathe very well and seem well built. That said, the glued-in insole is terrible and my feet hurt right now after spending most of the day on my feet, which has been the trend for the 2 months I've had these.
customer_reviews.author: ArcherSeven

customer_reviews.title: No support/not even remotely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes bc of reviews stating "these are the most comfortable" blah blah blah. There is zero support in these shoes. I have worn these once, and now they decorate my closet floor... where they will slowly collect dust until the next trip to the donation center. I like their appearance, just wished they wouldn't have been so flat.
customer_reviews.author: helen puckett

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is good but a lil bit expensive. I have not had any problems wit it but a good pair of Nike air max cost the same.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wood

customer_reviews.title: 14 Narrow - fit just right.
customer_reviews.text: I suffer with trying to buy shoes online and narrow. This was my first purchase of this brand, and I'm happy to say they fit as advertised. Very nice shoe, very comfy to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Skid

customer_reviews.title: Narrow width is available and light weight.
customer_reviews.text: I have a narrow foot with a size 14 length. This shoe fits like a glove. I was able to order a narrow width.
customer_reviews.author: Terence L. Camp

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful shoe!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always worn New Balance, but the style I wanted was out of stock. I read reviews of this shoe and decided to give it a try. I am so glad I did!!! My feet are HAPPY!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Paul D.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my teenage son. He loves the look and wears them every day. They are durable and have held up all summer. It is hard to find shoes big enough for his ever-growing feet, and these fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Joann Stallbaumer

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Husband is very happy with these shoes. Comfortable, supportive and good looking.
customer_reviews.author: 9bbirds

customer_reviews.title: Purpose of wide shoe defeated
customer_reviews.text: The benefits of an extra wide shoe are lost when the design brings the front of the shoe to a point, effectively pinching your toes from the sides. Gave it 3 stars because of the quality of material and overall appearance.
customer_reviews.author: B. D. Petrick

customer_reviews.title: Excellent .
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoe. Solid and well constructed. Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: iPhone

customer_reviews.title: Decent light walker
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and seems to be holding up after a month
customer_reviews.author: John the Arborist

customer_reviews.title: Sweet fitting/feeling shoe
customer_reviews.text: If they wear as good as they feel on my feet we have an excellent shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Chas Butturini

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and breathable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes because I have a hard time finding wide enough ahoes that don't look like something my grandpa would wear. They are very comfortable, fit true to size and are breathable. Definitely going to buy a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Only shoes I wear!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are wonderful! I got my custom inserts! I only wear this brand! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Terry C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Narrow Fit
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are awesome. I have a narrow foot and it's always a chore finding narrow shoes (Thank you, Amazon!).
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable yet stiff which is what i want walking jobsites nice ventilation great shoe
customer_reviews.author: Michael Allen Collins

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Not really happy with the shoe. My feet kill me in these after only a week of wear!!!! Waste of money!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie B

customer_reviews.title: fix as expected
customer_reviews.text: Best comfortable shoe/sneaker i have ever worn. Plus it's good for dress as well
customer_reviews.author: Robert Delaney

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and Quality
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe, comfortable and quality. Great for my job on concrete floors.
customer_reviews.author: Jikkity Jackity

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoes!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd pair. They are lightweight and breathe well but have enough support to use for light hiking. I also like that I can get them in narrow widths - not easy to find these days.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Gantenbein

customer_reviews.title: Stability sneaker? Yeah right . . .
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, feels ok, nothing amazing, definitely not a stability shoe. Barely any arch support. I feel the over pronation control to be ok. But for 30 bucks, I'll take it.
customer_reviews.author: Arjun Pravin

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Good fit. Comfortable. Have dabetes and comfort is an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Baka

product_meta.title: Prop Stability Fly
feature_bullets: Precision knit mesh with roomy toe box so toes have space to spread out improving stability
Soft cushioning PU for even wear with comfort ridges in forefoot and gel insert in heel
Supportive EVA midsole with rubber outsole for a long lasting smooth stride
